name: mri_make_bem_surfaces
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Tool to create Boundary Element Method (BEM) surfaces.

inputs.description: The name of the subject or session to process.
inputs.name: Subject/Session Name

inputs.description: Optional mfile parameter to provide additional settings.
inputs.name: M-file

output-files.description: Generated inner skull surface triangle file.
output-files.name: Inner Skull Triangle File

output-files.description: Temporary file for best guess at inner skull surface.
output-files.name: Inner Skull Temporary Triangle File
